turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, I'd like a Starbucks Black and White Mocha please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello, what size would you like your Black and White Mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the Grande size please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like 2%, nonfat, whole, almond, coconut, or soy milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmm.. the almond milk does sound good. Yes, I'll take the almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so far I have a Black and White Mocha, grande, with almond milk, and would you like whipped cream on that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you, hold the whipped cream please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Very well, no whipped cream. Can I get you anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please add a cinnamon shortbread latte, make that a grande as well please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, one cinnamon shortbread latte size grande and would you like almond milk for this one too?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, make that one a 2% milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, so far I have a black and white grande with almond milk and no whipped cream, and a grande cinnamon shortbread latte with 2% milk, and would you like whipped cream on the latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, thank you. Can you add a venti cafe mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, and which kind of milk would you like in the caffe mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like nonfat milk please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, one venti caffe mocha with nonfat milk and hold the whipped cream on this one too?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, you can leave the whipped cream on that one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm sorry, can you add another caffe mocha the same as the first one?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, that is a venti caffe mocha with nonfat milk and whipped cream on top?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's right. Can you repeat my order back to me so I can make sure its right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure thing. I have a a black and white grande with almond milk and no whipped cream, and a grande cinnamon shortbread latte with 2% milk, and no whipped cream, and 2 venti caffe mochas with nonfat milk and whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that sounds perfect. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your welcome. Your total is $23.27 at the window, thank you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm sorry how did it get to $23 dollars?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You ordered four coffees at five dollars a piece and a dollar extra for whip cream and almond milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, ok. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We accept debit, credit, and cash, no checks please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine, here is my card.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you, your order will be out in a moment, have a nice day.
